sentences.en: At this point our logic was at fault.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上,我们推理的方法是错误的.

sentences.en: By now all logic had gone out of the window.
sentences.cn: 到这时根本就不讲什么逻辑了。

sentences.en: He argues with learning and logic.
sentences.cn: 他的辩论既有学问又合逻辑.

sentences.en: He wasn't sure he'd got it right, although the theory attracted him by its logic.
sentences.cn: 该理论的逻辑性吸引了他，但他不能确定自己的理解是否正确。

sentences.en: His logic is too loose to make much sense.
sentences.cn: 他的推理太不严密,没什么道理.

sentences.en: I fail to see the logic behind his argument.
sentences.cn: 我不明白支持他论据的是什么逻辑。

sentences.en: It is a situation, in sum, devoid of logic.
Logic had prevailed and he had abandoned the idea.
sentences.cn: 最终理智占了上风，他打消了那个念头。

sentences.en: Logic is taught here as a separate subject.
sentences.cn: 逻辑学在这里是作为单独一门课来讲授的.

sentences.en: Might is right -- that is the logic of imperialism.
sentences.cn: 强权即公理 -- 这是帝国主义的逻辑.

sentences.en: The whole process is flawed because the logic behind the questions is too simplistic.
sentences.cn: 整个过程都有缺陷，因为问题背后的逻辑太过简单了。

sentences.en: There is a certain logic in their choice of architect.
sentences.cn: 他们对建筑师的选择是有一定道理的。

sentences.en: There is a compelling logic to his main theory.
sentences.cn: 他的主要理论蕴含令人信服的逻辑推理.

sentences.en: There is an alliance between logic and metaphysics.
sentences.cn: 逻辑与形而上学之间有类似之处.

sentences.en: There isa certain logicin their choice of architect.
sentences.cn: 他们对建筑师的选择是有一定道理的。

sentences.en: What sort of logic is that?
You arrived at your conclusion using the methods of formal logic.
sentences.cn: 你这个结论是按照形式逻辑的方法推论出来的.
